name: Meku
tagline: AI Web App and Site Builder
description: Meku.dev is an AI-powered web app and site builder engineered for developers. Generate, customize and deploy full-stack web apps and sites from simple AI prompts. Comes with essential integrations and deployment tools and hosting to launch your MVP fast.

name: Open SaaS 2.0
tagline: Free, open-source SaaS starter kit with superpowers
description: Build and launch your SaaS application faster with this starter kit‚Äîfree, open-source, full-stack React + Node.js. Features include auth, payments, AI example app, and admin dashboard.

name: UNDOOMED
tagline: Stop doomscrolling. A mute button for Reels, Shorts & feeds.
description: Tired of ‚Äú5 min‚Äù turning into 2 hours? Undoomed hides Reels/Shorts/TikTok feeds but leaves what matters‚Äîmessages and posts. Per-app settings, quick switch, light ‚Äúclarity‚Äù stats. iOS now, Android on the way.

name: Getillustrations Figma Plugin
tagline: Bring stunning vector illustrations straight into Figma
description: The power of Getillustrations directly in Figma! Our plugin is packed with thousands of ready-to-use illustrations for UI, apps and websites. Fast, editable, and designed to keep your workflow smooth, just download and link to your All access account.

name: AI Ultra Editing by Thumblify
tagline: Edit Like a Pro
description: ThumblifyAI Ultra Editing gives you full creative power. Lets you replace backgrounds, add elements, and fix every small detail in seconds. No limits, no complex tools. Just pure creativity made faster with AI.

name: Monitoro
tagline: Track AI & SEO Traffic o_O
description: Track traffic from AI, Google, and Bing in one place. Finally!

name: Flow Tabs Pro
tagline: Cut Chrome's memory usage in half with smart tab suspension
description: Stop Chrome from eating your RAM. Flow Tabs Pro suspends inactive tabs, cutting memory usage up to 50%. Super Focus Mode, session switching, and seamless tab management‚Äîall without disrupting your workflow. 7-day free trial.

name: Minarah - Prayer Reminder App
tagline: Never miss a prayer on your mac
description: Minarah is a full-screen prayer reminder for macOS with elegant alerts, Smart Countdown, and Focus Mode ‚Äî helping you stay on time for every Salah without breaking focus.

name: Strayl
tagline: Build everywhere
description: Strayl is a mobile AI coding agent - like Claude Code, but built for iOS. Edit, refactor, and preview your projects with AI. It connects to GitHub, indexes your codebase, connects to MCP servers to use their tools, and can spin up instant preview deployments.

name: AI Financial Report (10K, Q, etc)
tagline: Fast, clear annual report with smart financial metrics
description: Delivers instant, comprehensive financial report summaries with one click. Upload statements and get a clear breakdown of key metrics business, finance statement, growth all displayed in a modern UI. Save hours, work smarter, and make informed decisions.

name: Taggler ‚Äì Smart Budget by Frank
tagline: Organize your money visually with smart tag-based insights.
description: Taggler is a smart budget tracker that organizes your expenses using tags. Manage your money visually, set goals, and get insights ‚Äî all offline, private, and fast. Built 100% in Swift for iPhone users who want clarity and control.

name: Photowand
tagline: Cursor for photography
description: Transform selfies into professional AI photos. Generate LinkedIn headshots, dating profile photos, product shots in 60 seconds. No photographer needed. 450+ photo packs available.

name: Comma Reader
tagline: Book reader with Apple Intelligence powers
description: Privacy-first ebook reader for iOS. With on‚Äëdevice Apple Intelligence, get automatic categorization, tagging, chapter summaries, and explanations. Read, highlight, and organize. Your data never leaves your device.

name: Good Works
tagline: Neighborhood help network for meals, errands, and exchange.
description: A customizable community support app that connects neighbors with trust and dignity. Request or offer meals, errands, or companionship through a secure, private network built for real local care.

name: Thumbnail Fox
tagline: AI thumbnails Creator that Thinks for You
description: Thumbnail Fox helps fast-upload creators stop guessing and start uploading. Paste a video link, get three prod-grade thumbnail images, tweak with prompt-based editing, and export ‚Äî all in ~15 minutes. Free 200 credits for new signups

name: NotifyBreach
tagline: Search your domain. Take control of your breach data.
description: NotifyBreach helps organizations track every breach from their domain and employees, on the surface web and dark web. Every day, millions of corporate credentials are exposed. Get real-time alerts and protect your company affordably.

name: Pixeta
tagline: SVG to Pixel Art. Instant with gamified experience.
description: Transform SVG icons into stunning pixel art with Pixeta. Customize grid size, colors, shapes & transparency. Download as SVG, PNG or JPEG. Free pixel art generator!

name: Nityasha AI
tagline: Your personal AI assistant for everyday tasks and projects
description: Nityasha AI makes powerful AI accessible for everyone. Get instant help with writing, coding, research, and creative projects. Perfect for creators, developers, students, and professionals. Simple interface, powerful results. Your AI assistant, always ready.

name: Klain | Lets website talk using AI
tagline: Turn any website into an AI chatbot under 30 seconds
description: Turn any website into an AI chatbot. Simply paste your URL. We'll scrape, index, and deploy a custom AI chatbot that knows your content‚Äîready to embed in minutes.

name: Pikkovia.com
tagline: Your ultimate 3D icon library ‚Äî 1000+ and growing üöÄ
description: Pikkovia offers 1000+ 3D icon library‚Äîhigh-quality PNGs and Blender files for designers and developers. Perfect for app or website UI design and for any other design like banner or cards etc. Enjoy!
